TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter
Public NotInheritable Class JournalEntryUnifiedViewConverter Implements IMultiValueConverter

summary.span: 将后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录（由 或 公开）合并为单一的 Windows Internet Explorer 7 种样式的导航菜单。

span.span: merges navigation back history and navigation forward history (as exposed by or ) into a single, Windows Internet Explorer 7-style navigation menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和都 使用以下机制显示支持历史记录导航的导航镶边：Both and display navigation chrome that supports history navigation using the following mechanisms: - 用于一次导航一段内容的按钮。A button for navigating back one piece of content at a time. - 用于一次向前导航一段内容的按钮。A button for navigating forward one piece of content at a time. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]显示以下内容的样式下拉列表：An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list that shows: - 后退导航历史记录中的最多9个项的组合列表，前进导航历史记录中的最多9个项。A combined list of up to nine items in back navigation history and up to nine items in forward navigation history. - 与后退和前进导航历史记录相关的当前内容片段的位置。The position of the current piece of content with respect to both back and forward navigation history. 导航历史记录由 和 在以下属性中存储：The navigation history is stored by both and in the following properties: **后退导航历史记录**： 、 。**Back Navigation History**: , . **前进导航历史记录**： 、 。**Forward Navigation History**: , . 若要创建 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] -style 下拉列表， 并 使用 将其各个后退导航历史记录和前进导航历史记录合并到单个导航历史记录项列表中。To create the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, and use to merge their individual back navigation history and forward navigation history into a single list of navigation history entries. 结果列表包含后退导航历史记录中的最多9个条目，以及来自前进导航历史记录的最多9个条目，以及当前内容的条目。The resulting list contains up to nine entries from back navigation history and up to nine entries from forward navigation history, plus an entry for the current content. 如果创建自定义导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] ，并需要提供 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] 样式下拉列表，则可以使用 类似的效果。If you create custom navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and need to provide an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]-style drop-down list, you can use to similar effect. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。This class is not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何构造基于文本的导航历史记录菜单。The following example shows how to construct a text-based navigation history menu. 菜单使用 来组合所承载导航器的后退和前进导航历史记录 。The menu uses to combine both the back and forward navigation histories of the hosted navigator. [!code-xaml[JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets#JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterWithMenuXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/JournalEntryUnifiedPositionConverterSnippets/CS/mainwindow.xaml#journalentryunifiedpositionconverterwithmenuxaml)]

summary.span: 合并两个导航历史记录堆栈。

returns.span: 如果任何一个传递的导航堆栈都不是 ，则为可用于枚举导航历史记录堆栈合并列表的 。

span.span: An that can be used to enumerate the merged list of navigation history stacks if neither passed navigation stack is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 ，可以从以下属性获取导航堆栈：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - - 对于 ，可以从以下属性获取导航堆栈：For , the navigation stacks are available from the following properties: - 两个传递的导航堆栈合并为单个导航堆栈，其中每个导航堆栈和当前项包含最多九个项。The two passed navigation stacks are combined into a single navigation stack that contains up to nine items from each navigation stack plus the current item. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，或不能在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定项是后退导航历史记录、前进导航历史记录还是导航器的当前内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether an entry is in back navigation history, forward navigation history, or is the current content of a navigator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要 从导航器 (获取单个对象 ，请 ) ，调用 **RemoveBackEntry**： 、 、 。To get a single object from a navigator (, ), call **RemoveBackEntry**: , , . 若要从获取所有 对象 ，请枚举和返回的项 。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . 若要从获取所有 对象 ，请枚举和返回的项 。To get all objects from a , enumerate the entries that are returned by and . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员通常不在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，或不能在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
